questions.questionText: Consider tables R(A,B) and S(B,C) and a query Q = select A,C from R,S where R.B=S.B and A < 10 and C > 20. Which of the following materialzed views can NOT be used to help evaluate Q?

options.option: V1 = select A,C from R,S where R.B=S.B
V2 = select A,C from R,S where A < 10 and C > 20
V3 = select A,R.B,S.B,C from R,S where A < 10 and C > 20
V4 = select * from R where A < 10
